short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Lamden Vault made by Lamden.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with applications deployed on the Lamden network, or build your own! This wallet features a direct link to websites powered by Lamden to make interaction simple and easy. It also includes a development environment so you can build and deploy your own applications without needing to install a custom develop environment.
